requestssl-button-copy: Text for the 'Copy to Clipboard' button.
requestssl-comment-given: Displayed if a custom comment is given. $1 is the handler's username.
requestssl-comment-success: Message displayed when a comment is successfully added to the request.
requestssl-customdomain-no-hostname: Message displayed when no hostname has been inputted.
requestssl-customdomain-not-a-url: Message displayed when the custom domain input in the Special:RequestSSL form does not resemble a URL.
requestssl-customdomain-protocol-not-htt: Message displayed when the protocol in the inputted URL is not HTTPS.
requestssl-customdomain-unneeded-compone: Message displayed when there are unnecessary components in the URL.
requestssl-duplicate-request: Message displayed when user attempts to submit a request that is to similar to an existing open request.
requestssl-edit-success: Message displayed when the request is successfully edited.
requestssl-info-command: The generated command that is displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestSSLQueue. $1 is the generated command.
requestssl-info-groups: User groups that the requester has on the target wiki. Displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestSSLQueue. $1 is the requester's username; $2 is the target wiki's database name; $3 is the comma-separated list of user groups.
requestssl-info-request-private: Message that is displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestSSLQueue when viewing a request that is private.
requestssl-info-requester-globally-block: Message that is displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestSSLQueue when the requester has been globally blocked. $1 is the requester's username.
requestssl-info-requester-locally-blocke: Message that is displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestSSLQueue when the requester has been locally blocked on the current wiki. $1 is the requester's username; $2 is the current wiki's ID.
requestssl-info-requester-locked: Message that is displayed on the 'handling' section of Special:RequestSSLQueue when the requester has been locked. $1 is the requester's username.
requestssl-invalid-target: Status message displayed when invalid database name was entered for the 'target' field.
requestssl-label-add-comment: Label for the 'Add Comment' submit button.
requestssl-label-edit-request: Label for the 'Edit Request' submit button.
requestssl-label-status-updated-comment: Label for the optional comment field in the 'handling' section of Special:RequestSSLQueue.
requestssl-label-update-status: Label for the handling section of Special:RequestSSLQueue:
requestssl-no-changes: Message displayed if attempting to edit request without making any changes.
requestssl-notcentral:
Heading for the message displayed if there is a configured central wiki, and it is not the current wiki.
{{Identical|Disabled}}
requestssl-notcentral-text: Text for the message displayed if there is a configured central wiki, and it is not the current wiki.
requestssl-notification-body-new-request: Echo notification body for 'requestssl-new-request'. $1 is reason; $2 is the requester's username; $3 is the target wiki's database name.
requestssl-notification-header-comment: Echo notification header for 'requestssl-request-comment'. $1 is the request ID.
requestssl-notification-header-new-reque: Echo notification header for 'requestssl-new-request'. $1 is the request ID.
requestssl-notification-header-status-up: Echo notification header for 'requestssl-request-status-update'. $1 is the request ID.
requestssl-notloggedin: Error message if user tries to request a SSL certificate while not being logged in.
requestssl-private: Error message if a user tries to view a SSL certificate request that is marked as private and they do not have access to it.
requestssl-request-edited: 'Request edited' message. $1 is the actor's username; $2 is the changes that were made.
requestssl-request-edited-reason: Message displayed if the value of 'reason' was edited. $1 is the previous value; $2 is the new value.
requestssl-request-edited-source: Message displayed if the value of 'source' was edited. $1 is the previous value; $2 is the new value.
requestssl-request-edited-target: Message displayed if the value of 'target' was edited. $1 is the previous value; $2 is the new value.
requestssl-request-locked: Message displayed above the form at Special:RequestSSLQueue if the request is locked.
requestssl-request-reopened: 'Request reopened' message. $1 is the actor's username; $2 is the changes that were made.
requestssl-section-comments:
'Request Comments' section label.
{{doc-important|This means "comments about the request", not "ask for comments"}}
requestssl-section-details:
'Request Details' section label.
{{doc-important|This means "details about the request", not "ask for details"}}
requestssl-status-updated: Fixed comment given to requester when the status is updated. $1 is status.
requestssl-status-updated-success: Message displayed when the status of the request is successfully updated.
requestssl-success: Message after a SSL certificate request has been successfully submitted.
requestssl-success-locked: Message displayed when a request has been successfully locked.
requestssl-success-private: Message displayed when a request has been successfully marked as private.
requestssl-success-public: Message displayed when a request has been successfully marked as public.
requestssl-success-unlocked: Message displayed when a request has been successfully unlocked.
requestssl-table-requested-date: 'Requested Date' label for the table on Special:RequestSSLQueue.
requestssl-table-requester: 'Requester' label for the table on Special:RequestSSLQueue.
requestssl-table-status: 'Status' label for the table on Special:RequestSSLQueue.
requestssl-table-target: 'Target' label for the table on Special:RequestSSLQueue.
requestssl-unknown: Message displayed if the request is not found.
requestssl-usergroups-none: Displayed value if the requester has no user groups on the target wiki.
requestsslprivate-log-header: Header for the requestssl private log.
ipb-action-request-request-ssl: The label for the action select option on [[Special:Block]] to block a user from requesting SSL certificates.
